create(S3ServiceInfo, ServiceConnectorConfig) - Method in class com.emc.ecs.connector.spring.S3ServiceConnectorCreator
Creates an S3Connector instance with embedded Amazon Web Services S3 SDK Client from S3ServiceInfo.
createServiceInfo(Map<String, Object>) - Method in class com.emc.ecs.connector.cloudfoundry.S3ServiceInfoCreator
Parses Cloud Foundry serviceData Map and returns a normalized S3ServiceInfo instance to be used by Spring Cloud service connector creators.

S

S3Connector - Class in com.emc.ecs.connector.spring
Provides an AWS SDK S3 client & relevant configuration parameters that an application could need when addressing an S3 service.
S3ServiceConnectorCreator - Class in com.emc.ecs.connector.spring
Provides an implementation of AbstractServiceConnectorCreator that detects S3 service information and creates an S3Connector instance with embedded Amazon Web Services S3 SDK Client.
S3ServiceConnectorCreator() - Constructor for class com.emc.ecs.connector.spring.S3ServiceConnectorCreator
 
S3ServiceInfo - Class in com.emc.ecs.connector
Provides a normalized implementation of S3 service details which can be gleaned in multiple cloud environments.
S3ServiceInfo(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.emc.ecs.connector.S3ServiceInfo
Default Constructor.
S3ServiceInfoCreator - Class in com.emc.ecs.connector.cloudfoundry
Provides an implementation of CloudFoundryServiceInfoCreator that detects S3 tagged services bound to Cloud Foundry deployed application.
